channel.title: steam bug
channel.description: Hello, please help me! I'm trying to play black mesa makes 2 days, when I go to the library and try steam click the play nothing appears, I click'' play'' several times and nothing appears! :c (sorry for the bad english, I'm from Brazil xP)

item.title: steam bug
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Do you have the source sdk base 2007 folder in this location “\Steam\steamapps\youraccountname”*

*Account name is your user name when logging into Steam.

Read full topic

item.title: steam bug
item.dc:creator: John316
item.description:
Very same thing with me! I too click on the (PLAY)-button, but the game/BM does not start! What’s up with that guy’s and thanks big-time for the help!
